Name: Rock Life: The Rock Simulator
About the game: Built from the ground up, Rock Life is the next generation of rock simulation. Explore and feel nature as you become one with rocks and nature. Become and experience life as a rock via Desktop or through Virtual Reality! What do you do in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator ? Play as a rock! Enjoy the environment as a rock! Become different rocks as a rock! Enjoy playing as a rock in Virtual Reality! Become THE ROCK!
